website_summaries.verdict: The design and style of the Puma Fierce Strap received many praises from consumers. It was deemed comfortable to wear, and the roomy toe box was appreciated as well. Though a majority of the users had a positive disposition towards this shoe, there were some who were not satisfied with the heel support as well as the tight midfoot area. Still, the slip-on design and the snug fit were both enough to reel in consumers and purchase it.
pros: The cleat-like style of the Puma Fierce Strap received an overwhelmingly positive response from almost all the consumers
The majority commented that it was very comfortable for all-day use
Several people liked the slip-on design of the shoe
Many reviewers were delighted that they received lots of compliments whenever they wore the Fierce Strap
Some wearers commended the snug, but non-restrictive fit of this footwear
One user appreciated that there was enough room in the toe box
cons: A few individuals were not happy with how snug the midfoot of the Fierce Strap was
One person was not satisfied with the support it offered in the heel

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Sneaker!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even explain how much I love this sneaker. This is a great workout sneaker. I feel like I’m on a cloud walking in them. I’m usually a size 9.5 but I have long narrow feet so I ordered a 10, PERFECT FIT! They aren’t too snug, just right and I have wiggle room. I will be ordering the pink pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: After just walking outside (not working out) the part of the sole got detached! I had to pay for shipping when I returned to this seller! Horrible and disappointing experience. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aine Letcher

customer_reviews.title: it fits way tight around the foot, even though ...
customer_reviews.text: it fits way tight around the foot, even though I bought a size up from my actual size. they are cute but cant wear them for too long.
customer_reviews.author: jouliana jean paul

customer_reviews.title: impossible shoe
customer_reviews.text: this product was impossible to get into. It has no zipper or laces and was simply impossible to get on. Maybe someon can send me instruction how to accomplish this?
customer_reviews.author: Verena Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome looking, but seem to run small
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers are fabulous looking but they are not true to size. I normally wear a "10 ladies" in sneakers. And while I can get my foot into this sneaker, it was a difficult task, my toes touch the top of the toe area and the sneaker feels snug. I could not wear a sock if I wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vega

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sneakers for Trinidad carnival and I was 100% satisfied with the level of comfort it provided .After jumping and dancing for days on the road my feet didnt hurt, my toes didn't burn and my ankles didnt feel like they were falling off. I absolutely love this sneakers stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fierce first
customer_reviews.text: I love the Puma Fierce line, the looks and the feel of it on my feet. I use it mostly for Zumba and cannot help using it for style outside the gym as well. This Puma is fierce alright!
customer_reviews.author: MrsRH

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I find that the Puma Fierce are the most comfortable shoe for me to work out in and these are no different. Fits true to size. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tamia

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Love these but had to send back. Normally a 9 and couldn’t get foot in. If you can go 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest 93

customer_reviews.title: My go to shoes. Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I love the mesh sides. These are great for summer. I plan to wear these year round. The most comfortable shoes I own. I bought the 9.5 med as usual and felt the width could be wider. Easy to pull on and off. Love these. Will be buying another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Will order second pair
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger as not familiar with Puma sizes...so will order my own s use next time, great looking shoe and very comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: Carmel

customer_reviews.title: I gave the shoe 3 stars for the look I ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave the shoe 3 stars for the look I wear an 8 and ordered an 10 & They were extremely small. If you have wide feet don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great show for ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Gives great support to my ankle which I had surgery on.
customer_reviews.author: Andie Van Arsdale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cross trainers
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but supportive! Using for training, but I may get a pair for walking, I like them so much. And they're cool looking!
customer_reviews.author: ZsaZsa's mom

customer_reviews.title: Love love love em!
customer_reviews.text: Im so in love with my shoes. Went to Ross and seen these shoes in a size 8.5 tried them on and they where a tight fit. I hunted these down (double the prize but worth it) and got a size 9.5. They are a bit tight in the middle but I still love em!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: I love working out in these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pairs of this style of Puma. I love working out in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: How they wear.
customer_reviews.text: Fit snuggly on my foot needs a little breaking in but all in all very good love the look.
customer_reviews.author: patricia d johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are very comfortable and easy to just slip on and go. I’m gone have every color before too long
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Satchell

customer_reviews.title: I orders two sizes up but they are super comfy and I get a lot of compliments the ...
customer_reviews.text: I orders two sizes up but they are super comfy and I get a lot of compliments the left foot insole however keeps lifting for some reason not sure why but very nice shoes overall
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I have 3 pair and want more
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have 3 pair and want more. I have the white on white, royal blue with black and the black with silver straps. There comfortable, help with my flat arch and how I stand. I'm on my feet 12 hours a day working and this doesn't include going to or coming back from. I have to put them on with a shoe horn until they are broken in and I wear thin socks because they fit like a glove. I wear 6.5, the white leather ones I got in a 7 though.
customer_reviews.author: La Dandridge

customer_reviews.title: Product quality not worth price
customer_reviews.text: Material for this shoe such not be listed as a workout shoe, this is a soft based shoes not recommended for gym use
customer_reviews.author: S.T.F. LLC

customer_reviews.title: This shoes are very confortables
customer_reviews.text: At first it feels a little bit tight but it's just for a brief couple of minutes. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Aborigen360-Mj D’Santiago

customer_reviews.title: High aches are a no go
customer_reviews.text: Too tight across the arches. I have high arches. Nice shoes otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Matoba

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Style
customer_reviews.text: Love this sneaker and with prime you can have them in 2 days, got so many compliments and the best thing is they are extremely comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes , super comfortable and easy to slide on. I got lots of compliments too !!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Cuadra

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and snug. These shoes are true to size. I have narrow feet and tend to have a ton of room in my shoes(made me skeptical on the whole no laces concept), but these fit perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off. Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these kicks so much. Super comfy, easy slip on and off. They look great and go with all sorts of outfits.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and design. Very different. A little on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnda Charles

customer_reviews.title: The quality
customer_reviews.text: I check before upon description I think that is the material that I want, but when receive the shoes the material and the look is complete different.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are great for working out or a trip to the store

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the black and also the white I love these shoes. They look very sharp. I own five pairs of the Puma shoes

customer_reviews.text: Got shoes for my daughter's birthday, and she loves them! They are very light weight and look great on feet!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my shoes! I will order again! Perfect fit!

customer_reviews.title: Fashion forward shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love them great comfort, looks good, great fit. Very fashion forward

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fits as expected, very stylish I love them
customer_reviews.author: Tamell

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this shoe feels!!! And the look is the bomb!!
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They look way better in person and are super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Octavia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shoe! And it got here at the expected day. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and fly.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. So comfy I want to wear them all the time! I can wear these for many different occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted new shoes for the gym. I like style and how comfortable these pumas look. I was a bit worried about breaking them in but they are perfectly comfortable. The first time I wore these I ended up doing cardio day and ended up beating my time for my 3 mile run. My feet didn't hurt and they felt so comfortable. Update. I did get a few people compliment my shoes or see what brand they were. Good Job Puma! Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jnien29

customer_reviews.title: To Small
customer_reviews.text: Really to small. I have a small foot and ordered a half size larger....but they still were to small.
customer_reviews.author: Really?!

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: It fits a tad small, or tight rather but it could be because I'm pregnant as well so feet are just a little swollen but I definitely recommend this shoe. It's very cute, stylish
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Utility Player With Fierce Style!
customer_reviews.text: This particular design of the PUMA Fierce seems to work perfectly with everything - shorts, longer pants, and dresses. It has become my go-to "tennis" shoe because it's that great combo of fierce style, utility, and comfort. The high-top is just the perfect height, and I'm not a huge fan of shoelaces, so the fact that this is a slip-on makes it ideal.
customer_reviews.author: TMTime

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Fierce Strap WN's Cross-Trainer Shoe
product_meta.description: This demi-cut, lightweight trainer combines performance technology with eye-catching style
